content: प्रकर्षण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Paining, harassing, troubling. --णं {@--1@} The act of drawing away; attracting. {@--2@} Ploughing. {@--3@} Duration, length, extension. {@--4@} Excellence, superiority. {@--5@} Distraction. {@--6@} Realizing by the use of a pledge more than the interest of the money lent upon it.
